content: Learning, Communications, and Wireless Networks Lab (CWNlab) – CWN Lab PreviousNext123456789101112131415161718192021 About LCWN Lab Director: Dr. Nazanin Rahnavard At the Learning, Communications, and Wireless Networks Lab (LCWN lab), our passion is to significantly advance telecommunication, networking, and sensing systems by devising novel frameworks, schemes, and applications. Our research effort bridges several areas such as telecommunications, modern wireless networking, signal processing, and machine learning. Our research interests include: Deep learning: theory and applications Machine/Deep Learning Applications in Communication Systems High-dimensional and Big data analysis Compressive Sensing Cognitive Radio Networks and RF Spectrum Cartography Wireless Ad-Hoc and Sensor Networks LCWNLab is located at: 331 and 365 Harris Corp.
